description: Shuxiang Technology leverage the power of location, creative, and smart audience data to drive meaningful connections between brands and audiences in the real world with out of home advertising.
RMNDescription: Retail Media Network (RMN) is a digital marketing model in which retailers use their platforms or physical stores to sell advertising space to brand owners, allowing them to reach consumers directly and generate additional revenue for the retailer.
aboutDescription: Shuxiang Technology is first RMN platform focusing on physical channels promotes information to consumers in specific areas through unique media red dragon pillars in Taiwan . Whether it is event announcements, instant messages or advertising materials, exposure can be uploaded through the CMS system.
aboutNumDescription1: First-hand information collected by companies from consumers.
aboutNumDescription2: Effectively clarify the relationship between advertising spend and sales.
aboutNumDescription3: The advertising content is related to the product and has a strong shopping orientation.
aboutNumDescription4: Ensure a large number of consumers, enough to reach the target customers.
aboutNumDescription5: Meet current search needs and effectively guide to final conversion.
productDescription: Utilizing advanced DOOH advertising tools to provide advertisers with more options and enhance the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.
serviceDeacription: Easy operation, quick content updates and publishing, accurate advertising placement.
contactDeacription: Feel free to contact us any time, we will get back to you as soon as we can.
addressEN: Rm. 813, 8F., No. 7-1, Dehui St., Zhongshan Dist., Taipei City
